description:
La version française se trouve après le texte anglais

Come and Join Eveli and Geoffrey for a very special evening of breathing together in Brussels.


This is will be an evening when you will be able to discover and directly experience the power of the breath to help you live a peaceful and happy life in line with your higher aspirations.

This will be an evening dedicated to sharing, breathing, stress management and well-being, while remaining firmly rooted in the reality of the here and now and the development of the principles and practice of mindfulness techniques.

What is it?

The technique is very simple and effective and has helped many people to improve the quality of their life both inner and outer. Once you have learnt the effectiveness of the connected breath you will be able to use it anywhere to restore calm and balance to your life.

The breath has been used through the ages in many different healing/shamanic traditions and forms the fundamental bedrock of meditation systems throughout the world.

There are many such breathing groups around the world at the moment.

Who should come?

The evening is open to any healthy person whether they are novices or experienced breathers!

What should I bring?


You will need to bring a mat to lie on, a pillow and a warm covering. You should dress very comfortably and warmly. You should also bring some water to drink.

Can I ask more questions?

Yes you can, simply contact Geoffrey or Eveli by email or by phone and we will be very happy to answer any and all of your questions about breathwork or this event.

Contact Geoffrey on [masked] or click on the contact link on the left to send us an email.

---------------------------------------------

version française

Venez vous joindre à Eveli et Geoffrey pour une soirée très spéciale de respirer ensemble à Bruxelles.

Ce sera une soirée où vous serez en mesure de découvrir et d'expérimenter directement la puissance du souffle pour vous aider à vivre une vie paisible et heureuse en adéquation avec vos aspirations plus élevées.

Ce sera une soirée dédiée au partage, à la respiration, à la gestion du stress et au bien-être, tout en restant solidement ancrée dans la réalité du maintenant et ici et le développement des principes et la pratique des techniques de pleine conscience.

Qu'est-ce que c'est?

La technique est très simple et efficace et a aidé beaucoup de gens à améliorer leur qualité de vie à la fois intérieure et extérieure. Une fois que vous avez appris l'efficacité de la respiration connectée, vous serez capable de l'utiliser n'importe où pour rétablir le calme et l'équilibre dans votre vie.

Le souffle a été utilisé à travers les âges dans beaucoup de traditions différentes, dont des rituels chamaniques et de guérison. Le souffle est le substratum fondamental des systèmes de méditation à travers le monde.

Aujourd’hui, Il existe de nombreux groupes de respiration à travers le monde.

Qui devrait venir?

La soirée est ouverte à toute personne en bonne santé, qu’elle soit novice ou expérimentée.

Que dois-je apporter?

Vous aurez besoin d'apporter un tapis sur lequel s'allonger, un oreiller et une couverture chaude. Vous devriez vous habiller très confortablement et chaudement. Vous devriez également apporter de l'eau pour vous désaltérer.

Puis-je poser plus de questions?

Bien évidemment ! Il suffit de nous contacter, Geoffrey ou Eveli, par courriel ou par téléphone et nous serons très heureux de répondre à toutes vos questions sur la respiration ou cet événement.

Contactez Geoffrey au [masked] ou cliquez sur le lien de contact sur la gauche pour nous envoyer un email.
how_to_find_us: Centre les Sources, Rue Kelle 48, 1200 Woluwe St Lambert , Brussels
name: An Introduction to Breathwork with a group breath

description:
You are very welcome to join a day full of discovering SOURCE Process and Breathwork, to learn how the birth impacts your life, your thought patterns now and how to use connected breath and Archetypal Affirmations to bring integration and change in your awareness and behaviour.

Full day includes self-diagnostic work, deepenings/meditations and full breathing session.

Please contact [masked] for full details. Or;

You can find the invitation here: https://dl.dropbox.com/u/17686/Invitation_Binnie_Bxl_Apr2013_plakat.pdf

or here to download the brochure: https://dl.dropbox.com/u/17686/Binnie_brochure%20April%2021.pdf

 

Vous êtes les bienvenus à une journée entière consacrée à la découverte de SOURCE Process and Breathwork par Binnie A Dansby, professeur internationalement reconnue. Ne vous êtes-vous jamais demandés quel impact avait votre naissance sur votre vie, sur vos pensées intérieures et leur structure? Saviez-vous qu’il est possible de changer vos attitudes au niveau cellulaire? Venez le découvrir! Le séminaire se déroulera en anglais, avec traduction vers le français.

http://www.facebook.com/#!/events/[masked]/?fref=ts
name: The Impact of Birth on all of Life with Binnie A Dansby

description:
Everybody is welcome to explore and find their Source...
We invite you to relax and breathe, to listen to the body, the deep messages it holds. In the centre of your being there is a source, basis of being..your centre of truth, wisdom and love.

All the participants of the April 21st seminar are welcome to join and integrate more deeply the experiences of Sunday´s seminar.

Very experienced SOURCE Process and Breathwork Therapist, Lembe Allik from Estonia will join us and support the breathing!

 

Contribution to the evening: 20 EUR
name: Integrating SOURCE experience...

description:
This is the time of year when the gardeners among us are busy tending to the new growth in the garden and it was whilst I was  thinking about this that it dawned on me how important it is for us to look at the "soil" that is supporting our "roots" and the importance of regularly evaluating how we nourish and take the time to look at what is serving us, and what may need changing in our lives.  I then realized that NOW is the perfect time to stop, take a deep breath and look at where we are at. This is the season for new ways and ideas to blossom, and with the astrological alignments as they are at the moment, it seems the planets are favoring us too. 

It is always worth taking a little time to reflect on how we are, listen to our body and see if there is anything we need or we can give ourselves? A great way to get in touch with our true self is through a breathwork session.

Join us this Wednesday for a breathing circle session that will not only be supported by Eveli and myself, but has huge auspicious astrological support as well.

So please come and join us. You can find out more details and/or sign up for the session here or you can contact me on <a target="_blank">+32 [masked]</a>.

I am looking forward to seeing you there.

Geoffrey
how_to_find_us: Centre les Sources, Rue Kelle 48, 1200 Woluwe St Lambert , Brussels
name: Breathing into your roots

description:
<a>La version française se trouve après le texte anglais</a>

"My cousin Caterpillar has great changes coming One day he'll wake with wings" - The Incredible String Band

On May 29th, we will breathe into Transition.

http://photos1.meetupstatic.com/photos/event/3/d/c/e/event_217095822.jpegWe are constantly being challenged by change, constantly. We are constantly undergoing transitions such as moving schools, house or from one country to another. These are relatively big transitions, but there are many, many small ones happening in our daily lives such as what to wear, what to eat, what to do, where to go, how to get there. The list is almost endless!

The basis for transition is change, and, change is one of the biggest things that we struggle and suffer with. Change, one of the absolute truths, is a constant in our lives at all levels. Change reminds us that there is no "ground under our feet" that in fact "being in the flow" is our true nature, and, it is only when we try to stop the "flow" that we experience suffering. As humans we are masterful adepts of trying to stop the "flow", but no matter how hard we try that "flow" just keeps on flowing.

At this time,, and particularly on the 29th we are being offered an opportunity to embrace change, in the form of transition, by breathing into and acknowledging the changes we have made in this life and open ourselves up to the potential that change offers us to love ourselves more.

Come and join us to release old suppressed feelings and give loving Energy to Transitions in Your Life.

What is it?

The technique is very simple and effective and has helped many people to improve the quality of their life both inner and outer. Once you have learnt the effectiveness of the connected breath you will be able to use it anywhere to restore calm and balance to your life.

The breath has been used through the ages in many different healing/shamanic traditions and forms the fundamental bedrock of meditation systems throughout the world.

There are many such breathing groups around the world at the moment.

Who should come?

The evening is open to any healthy person whether they are novices or experienced breathers!

What should I bring?


You will need to bring a mat to lie on, a pillow and a warm covering. You should dress very comfortably and warmly. You should also bring some water to drink.

Can I ask more questions?

Yes you can, simply contact Geoffrey or Eveli by email or by phone and we will be very happy to answer any and all of your questions about breathwork or this event.

Contact Geoffrey on [masked] or click on the contact link on the left to send us an email.

---------------------------------------------

version française

« De grands changements arrivent chez mon cousin Caterpillar. Un jour, il se réveillera avec des ailes. » - Le lien incroyable de ficelle

Le 29 mai, nous respirerons dans la transition avec Eveli et Geoffrey.

Nous sommes constamment mis au défi par le changement. Oui, constamment ! Nous subissons constamment des transitions telles que le changement d’école, de maison ou de pays.

Ces transitions sont relativement grandes, mais il y en a beaucoup. De nombreuses petites transitions prennent place dans notre vie de tous les jours comme ; quoi porter, quoi manger, quoi faire, où aller, comment y arriver. Cette liste est infinie !

La base de la transition est le changement, et le changement est l’une des plus grandes choses avec lesquelles nous nous battons et qui nous font souffrir. Le changement, une vérité absolue, est une constante dans nos vies, à tous niveaux.

Le changement nous rappelle qu’il n’y a pas de « sol sous nos pieds » qu’en réalité «  être dans le flux » est notre vraie nature, et que c’est uniquement quand nous essayons d’arrêter ce flux que nous expérimentons la souffrance. Tenter de cesser ce « flux » ; les Humains en sont des adeptes. Peu importe notre acharnement, ce « flux » continue.

En ce moment, et particulièrement le 29 mai, l’opportunité d’enlacer le changement, sous forme de transition,  nous est offert. Nous le ferons en respirant, en comprenant les changements que nous avons fait dans cette vie et en s’ouvrant sur le potentiel que le changement nous offre à nous aimer plus.

Venez et rejoignez nous pour relâcher de vieux sentiments réprimés et donner de l’énergie positive aux transitions dans votre vie.

Qu'est-ce que c'est?

La technique est très simple et efficace et a aidé beaucoup de gens à améliorer leur qualité de vie à la fois intérieure et extérieure. Une fois que vous avez appris l'efficacité de la respiration connectée, vous serez capable de l'utiliser n'importe où pour rétablir le calme et l'équilibre dans votre vie.

Le souffle a été utilisé à travers les âges dans beaucoup de traditions différentes, dont des rituels chamaniques et de guérison. Le souffle est le substratum fondamental des systèmes de méditation à travers le monde.

Aujourd’hui, Il existe de nombreux groupes de respiration à travers le monde.

Qui devrait venir?

La soirée est ouverte à toute personne en bonne santé, qu’elle soit novice ou expérimentée.

Que dois-je apporter?

Vous aurez besoin d'apporter un tapis sur lequel s'allonger, un oreiller et une couverture chaude. Vous devriez vous habiller très confortablement et chaudement. Vous devriez également apporter de l'eau pour vous désaltérer.

Puis-je poser plus de questions?

Bien évidemment ! Il suffit de nous contacter, Geoffrey ou Eveli, par courriel ou par téléphone et nous serons très heureux de répondre à toutes vos questions sur la respiration ou cet événement.

Contactez Geoffrey au [masked] ou cliquez sur le lien de contact sur la gauche pour nous envoyer un email.
how_to_find_us: Centre les Sources, Rue Kelle 48, 1200 Woluwe St Lambert , Brussels
name: Being At Ease With Transitions In Life

description:
https://mail.google.com/mail/u/1/?ui=2&ik=bb638b18fc&view=att&th=13f2d07138a8e95e&attid=0.2&disp=emb&zw&atsh=1Kom de KRACHT VAN DE ADEM (her)ontdekken .
Ervaar ademhalingstechnieken die zo oud zijn als het leven zelf met als voordeel :

in totale ontspanning te komen, een diep welzijn, een transformatie van energie, een emotionele healing van wat diep in het geheugen van onze cellen is gegrift, verbinding voelen met Al wat leeft en je vitaliteit een boost geven, stress en spanningen loslaten en burn-out preventie.

Kan je een natuurlijker en voordeliger vinden om je levenskwaliteit te behouden en verhogen ?
“Breathing Circles” bestaan over de gehele wereld en worden gefaciliteerd door professionals die deze stressmanagement tools willen verspreiden bij zoveel mogelijk mensen.
Via eenvoudige oefeningen ervaar je de samenhang van ademhaling, denken en voelen, je merkt waar blokkades zitten, je doorvoelt bewust en laat spanning los.
De bedoeling is terug het vol potentieel van je ademhalingsapparaat te vinden om die optimaal aan te wenden voor een groter bewustzijn, evenwicht, gezonder fysiek, emotioneel, mentaal en energetisch lichaam.
De diepe spirituele verbinding en het welzijn die uitgaan van zoveel zuurstof bewust in te nemen en tijd te nemen voor jezelf is krachtig en …. zo simpel! Maar wanneer gunnen we die quality time aan onszelf ?

We bieden jullie de mogelijkheid om die eenvoudige praktijk van bewust ademen met zijn vele voordelen te komen proeven in een informeel samenkomen in een cirkel van levenslustige mensen.

Facilitators : Daniëlle De Wilde, Fabienne Doyen en Luc Maertens zijn professionele coaches, vrijwilligers bij IBFwww.ibfnetwork.com

Daniëlle De Wilde is co-oprichter van coachingsinstituut Elan Vital – Bao Group www.baogroup.be voor persoonlijke ontwikkeling.

Wanneer : 14 juni van 19 tot 22 u
Deelname : 20 euro.
Adres: Wemmel, voor meer info: mail naar [masked] of [masked]
Meebrengen:
• matje
• deken om goed warm te hebben
• kussen
• losse kledij, water

Inschrijven: > Online Inschrijvingsformulier

https://tout-user-store.s3.amazonaws.com/assets/static/tout-app-button.pngWil je deelnemen, je kan ook asap reserveren via [masked] – Het aantal deelnemers is beperkt .

Weet je dat ieder jaar in telkens een ander land een internationale conferentie van een week plaatsheeft met “Adem” als thema en waar wereldburgers uit de sector persoonlijke ontwikkeling, gezondheid en begeleiding iedere jaar samenkomen om uit te wisselen …. therapeuten, coaches , schrijvers, artiesten … of simpelweg mensen die persoonlijke groei au sérieux nemen.

Met hartelijke groeten,

https://mail.google.com/mail/u/1/?ui=2&ik=bb638b18fc&view=att&th=13f2d07138a8e95e&attid=0.3&disp=emb&zw&atsh=1

Daniëlle De Wilde

 

Les « Breathing Circles », une invitation à venir (re)découvrir les vertus du travail avec le souffle, du ‘breathwork’

https://mail.google.com/mail/u/1/?ui=2&ik=bb638b18fc&view=att&th=13f2d0a391d8a2e8&attid=0.2&disp=emb&zw&atsh=1 La respiration consciente Beaucoup d’entre nous ressentent une difficulté grandissante à vivre sereinement dans le respect de leurs valeurs personnelles, un sentiment d’impuissance face à une machine qui s’emballe. Comme une déconnexion, un manque d’alignement, une tension physique qui grandit, une impression de courir de plus en plus vite, d’atteindre une limite… D’être à bout de souffle ?

Et si nous nous reconnections à ce simple outil de self coaching qu’est la respiration !

Qu’est-ce que le travail avec le souffle ou breathwork ?

Il s’agit de techniques de respiration consciente et connectée.

Il y a diverses écoles, qui toutes poursuivent le même objectif : améliorer et préserver notre qualité de vie, nous permettre un état de relaxation et de bien-être profond, une transformation des énergies, la guérison émotionnelle de ce qui est inscrit dans nos mémoires cellulaires. Un outil accessible à chacun, tout ce qu’il y a de plus naturel, pour un mieux être immense.

Une voie privilégiée pour retrouver son élan vital.

Juste en respirant ! Simple, n’est-ce pas ? Mais quand prenons-nous vraiment le temps de nous accorder un tel bien-être, le cadeau d’un moment juste pour nous-mêmes ?

Les vertus du travail par le souffle ont été soulignées depuis toujours dans les courants culturels du mon entier : dans les médecines ayurvédique ou chinoise, dans les pratiques de la relaxation, du yoga, de la méditation, dans le sport de haut niveau, dans l’étude du système nerveux par la médecine occidentale, …

Le souffle est une des portes d’entrée de prédilection du coaching ontologique : le coaching de l’Etre, qui prend si bien en compte notre complexité et la relation intime qui unit pensées, émotions, corps, souffle et dimension spirituelle. C’est une autre façon de découvrir nos blocages, de les expérimenter consciemment et … de les lâcher. La respiration connectée, et l’apport intensif d’oxygène à notre système qu’elle crée, nous fait vivre une intense connexion avec nous-mêmes, avec notre nature profonde, avec notre souffle essentiel de vie, avec notre part de divin …

Et les Breathing Circles ?

Les Breathing Circles sont des soirées ouvertes à tous, débutants ou initiés au breathwork.

Elles proposent de pratiquer le travail par le souffle selon une méthodologie bien spécifique, en groupe (vingtaine de personnes). Leur objectif est de promouvoir le breathwork, d’en faire découvrir les bienfaits à un maximum de personnes, à un prix démocratique.

Ce sont des rencontres dédiées au partage, à la respiration, à la gestion du stress et au bien-être, le tout en restant bien ancré dans la réalité de l’ici et maintenant.

Et les breathing circles sont une initiative mondiale: ils ont lieu sur les 5 continents ! (voir www.breathingcircle.com)

Une magnifique une manière de se reconnecter avec soi, avec les autres, avec le monde.

L’occasion de découvrir, ou de redécouvrir, les vertus de pratiques simples, pour une sérénité intérieure, une connexion spirituelle profonde et une guérison au quotidien. La simple pratique de la respiration consciente a amélioré la vie de nombreuses personnes.

Nous nous rencontrons pour célébrer le breathwork et partager les bienfaits de cet outil de transformation puissant, dans un cadre sobre, avec l’accompagnement de plusieurs professionnels en la matière.

Dates: 14 juin à Wemmel

Horaires : de 19h à 22h.

Avec qui ?

Daniëlle De Wilde et Fabienne Doyen organisent et facilitent les Breathing Circles en région bruxelloise. D’autres professionnels du travail avec le souffle se joignent régulièrement à elles.

Fabienne et Daniëlle sont toutes 2 coachs professionnels ICF et membres actifs de l’International Breathwork Foundation (www.ibfnetwork.com). Elles ont co-organisé la Global Inspiration Conference 2012 (www.gic2012.com) qui a réunit 170 adeptes du travail avec le souffle en juillet dernier.

-> inscription en ligne

Si vous souhaitez participer à un prochain breathing circle, merci de prendre contact par mail : [masked] ou[masked]

Au plaisir de vous retrouver à cette occasion, ou à une autre,
Fabienne et Daniëllewww.baogroup.be

https://mail.google.com/mail/u/1/?ui=2&ik=bb638b18fc&view=att&th=13f2d0a391d8a2e8&attid=0.3&disp=emb&zw&atsh=1 https://mail.google.com/mail/u/1/?ui=2&ik=bb638b18fc&view=att&th=13f2d0a391d8a2e8&attid=0.4&disp=emb&zw&atsh=1
how_to_find_us: voor meer info: mail naar f.doyen@baogroup.be of d.dewilde@baogroup.be
name: Kom de KRACHT VAN DE ADEM

name: An Introduction To Breathwork with a group breathwork

description:
Holidays are over and bi-monthly Breathing Circle is starting again! Both beginner and experienced breathers are very welcome!

We are full of sun and good Summer energy and ready to share it with you. Come and join us to enjoy conscious breath and learn new ways to expand your thoughts and raise your energy level. During our first group breathwork session in September we shall explore the topics such as:

• how do I start new projects in my life?


• what are the thoughts that I give energy to when I am exploring new ideas and ways to implement them? 

• how to let go of the thoughts and patterns that do not support me and the implementations of my ideas? 

During the evening, we shall have a discussion on the topic, 1h group breathwork session and sharing of the experiences, questions and time for integration.
name: Breathing Circle - New season!

description:
An evening group breathwork with Eveli & Geoffrey

Dive into the vast ocean of your psyche, cracking open all that has been frozen allowing you to emerge into your greatness.
The Breath is all you need.

Using the power of community and breath to unlock the personal and collective unconscious, allows us to explore the deepest aspects of Self and Spirit. This is a breathing journey going deep within to connect with your Inner Wisdom. It draws on ancient healing and spiritual practice from around the world. A combination of everything we have learned ranging from breathing techniques, meditation techniques, forgiving yourself and loving yourself techniques, and lastly how to release what you don't want which only makes room for what you do want.

This is a guided breathing experience for you to get a sense of what breathwork is like.

There are only a limited number of places so please register to assure yourself of a place.

Thank you and we look forward to seeing you.
name: ♥ ♥ Show-up & Breathe ♥ ♥ 26/9

description:
A lot is happening in our lives. Everyday we face situations where we can consciusly choose how to react and what to create. Sometimes we face challenging moments, some call them problems where we are not fully aware what is happening and why it is happening. Have you found yourself sometimes trapped in old patterns? During this evening we shall use something called Creative Solutions Profile to analyze ourselves and create new patterns that support us!


Come and join us!
Come and make a choice about what to think, so that the energy from connected conscious breath can nourish your thoughts!
Come and choose how to experience the next situation in your life!

The cost: 20€

Bring water, and a mat to lie on. Wear warm, loose, comfortable clothes.
name: Breathing Circle - Creative and conscious solutions :-)

description:
Bring balance back into your life. Relieve, even remove, stress and become aware of your stress triggers.

This will be an evening where we will explore what causes you to become stressed and techniques you can use right now to gain relief from that stress.

You will need to bring a warm cover and a mat to lie on, some water and your stress!

The cost is 20€ payable at the door.

Please register to make sure of your place.
name: Breathing Circle, November 14th, Breathing Your Stress Away

description:
Breathing the Body Alive!

We will concentrate on getting to know our bodies better than ever! Being present in the moment is very often the primary key to allow us to act and behave in most loving as well as efficient way. Being present in the moment is all about being aware of your body, your thoughts and feelings. During the breathwork session, we will pay a lot of attention to breathing into all parts of the body and learning what the body wants to tell us. 


In the end, we will be more relaxed and conscious of our body and its messages!

Cost: 20 eur

Bring mat to lie on, bottle of water and wear comfortable clothes.
name: Breathing Circle November 29th, Breathing the Body Alive!

description:
Breath is the bridge which connects life to consciousness, which unites your body to your thoughts.

~ Thích Nhất Hạnh

Come and experience the power of breathwork, come and experience the bliss of release
name: Breathing Circle, December 6th, Turn up and Breathe!

description:
Celebration! The end of the year is approaching and it is such a lovely time to look back and really celebrate!


Come and celebrate with us! Come and celebrate together with us anything you like. Yourself. Courageous choices. Unconditional Love. Holiday Season. Light. All the things from 2013. Gifts from the Nature. Children. Changes in Life. Sunshine. Smiling people in the streets. Honey from the Little Bees. Chocolate. Future. Being connected to everything that breathes and lives. Being accepted the way you are.... the list is endless :-) and is dependant on you and your choices! Come and celebrate! 

Celebration and gratitude are magnificient tools to create more loving Energy to your Life. It will be good session to guide us into a loving path of the Holiday Season.


Thank you for being here with us and reading our invitation Lets celebrate the breathing together during the last Breathing Circle of 2013!

Cost: 20 eur

Bring a mat to lie on, bottle of water and wear comfortable clothes.
name: Breathing Circle, December 13th, Breath of Christmas!

description:
It is our First Breathing Circle in 2014! Come and join us for a conscious Breath!


We shall explore different predictions for the year 2014 and make plans of our own. We will have a full breathwork session and time for integration.


How would you like your new year to be?

What do you need to create it the way you want it?


Come and empower yourself!

Cost: 20 eur

Bring mat/blanket and a bottle of water.
name: Breathing Circle, January 10th

description:
How is your relationship with yourself? Is it loving, gentle, full of joy and happiness?


The relationship we have with ourselves is reflected in all the relationships we have in our lives with the others. Come and concentrate on letting go of the feelings opposite to Love and Connection!


Come and expand in Love!

Cost: 20 eur


Bring mat to lie on (or rent it for 1 euro from the YogaLoft), bottle of water and have comfortable clothes.
name: Breathing Circle, January 24th on Love!

description:
Dear everyone,

On February 7th, our Breathing Circle will concentrate on the topic of Abundance. Thought plus Energy creates results in the physical universe. Therefore, we shall explore our old patterns, turn them into positive new thought forms supporting your Life today. Before the breathing we will also do a small self-diagnostical questionnaire about patterns about Abundance and Money.  We will have a full breathwork session to give more Energy to the new thought forms.


How do you perceive abundace?


What have been the patterns of thought and

the patterns of behaviour in your family about abundance?

About money particular? 

Come and clear your body and mind to create more Abundance in your Life! 

Bring a bottle of water, a mat to lie on, and wear comfortable clothes!
name: Breathing Circle, February 7th on Abundance

description:
We have been concsious Beings long before we tend to remember ourselves. There are lots of influences in our present lives from the time of our Birth. Decisions we as concsious Human Beings did at birth and in early childhood may still be manifesting as  disturbing patterns in our lives. It is important to recognise them and turn them consciously around in our breathing session. This makes it also easier to recognise the patterns in our every day life and consciously make  different decisions!


We will have a full breathwork session as usual and also some self-diagnostics (questions and small meditation) before the session.


I encourage you to read what one of my Breathwork Teachers has written about Birth :


http://www.binnieadansby.com/ecstatic-life/Healing-Source-Experience


We will have lots of Support during this Breathing Circle while very experience Breath Therapists will join the evening! Come and join as well!
name: Breathing Circle, February 28th on Patterns of Behaviour since Birth

description:
Well-known international breathwork teacher is coming to Brussels to do a full weekend seminar.  It is a wonderful opportunity to benefit from the teachings of Binnie A Dansby and her SOURCE Process and Breathwork.


For more information, please see https://www.facebook.com/events/216387631890883/ for Friday evening and  https://www.facebook.com/events/216387631890883/ for full weekend-seminar.
name: Recommended seminar by Binnie A Dansby

description:
Dear Meetup-group,

the next Breathing Circle will be already this Friday. It will concentrate on finding out how do we tend to give away our inner Power. What do we do (or not do) and what do we say (or not say) consiously or unconsciously that allows us to distance from the One we truly are? How do we diminish our Power "to move the mountains" in our lives? What is stopping us to show how wonderful and truly migthy we are? Is it fear? Uncertainty? Something else? Let´s find out! The evening will include some self-diagnostical work, full breathing session and time for integration. Bring mat to lie on, wear comfortable clothes and have bottle of water to nourish your body! Cost: 20 eur

You are all very welcome! First-timers - come and try something new! ;)
name: Friday, March 21st: Breathing Circle on Empowering ourselves

description:
Already this Friday we will meet again to breathe together. This time we shall concentrate on feminity and masculinity within ourselves, the way we treat our inner woman and inner man. 

How do you treat men in your life? What are your relationship patterns with men?


How do you treat women in your life? What are your relationship patterns with women?

Come and find out! We will do some self-diagnostical work, have a fulle breathing session and integration phase. Come and change your life!


When: Friday 4th at 7.45 pm

Where: Yoga Loft

Cost: 20 eur

Where comfortable clothes and have water bottle with you :)
name: Friday, April 4th - Breathing Circle on Female and Male Energies

description:
Welcome to our next Breathing Circle! This Friday we will breathe into Safety!


How safe do you feel in your everyday life? How safe do you feel in your body? Do you feel that your body is protected and safe everywhere you go and everywhere you are?


Feeling safe is one of the ground concepts of Being. If you feel safe, you can do anything with more ease and pleasure. If you feel safe, you are more relaxed. Many experienced breathworkers have found that the more safe you feel, the more creative you are as well.


Come and Energize Your Body with the Power of Breath! Feel Safe, Be Safe!


Bring mat to lie one and bottle of water, wear comfortable clothes.


Cost 20 EUR.
name: Friday April 25th, Breathing Circle
Let's meet for another round of breathing and energizing our body and our mind.
how_to_find_us: The Yoga studio is only one tram (tram 92) stop from metro Louisa.

name: Friday, May 23rd: Breathing Circle

description:
This is an introduction evening to self help/healing/energizing/expanding your consciousness by using your breath.

Real change starts from inside, all the questions you are asking yourself about your life and more, are coming from inside, but also, all the answers are there.

You can help yourself with a simple breathing exercise!

You can have more energy, sleep better, relax deeper, you can stop making the same mistakes!

You can clear your mind and body from negative thoughts and feelings!

Why the breath?

The breath is something you have since the moment of your birth. It is the bridge between your conscious and unconscious, between your mind and body. Breath  is the basis of many meditations, and most body & mind therapies. By changing the way you breathe you can help your solving long standing emotional and physical problems, but not only that.

By reaching deep state of body and mind relaxation you can unlock your creativity; have more clarity about your life, simply IMPROVE your life on all levels of your being!

Rebirthing/Breathwork is a simple and safe breath technique and a journey towards yourself.

The workshop is in English, and there will be a full session, which means direct experience of the technique!

I’m involved in the field of personal growth since 1998, through Rebirthing, Enlightenment.Intensives, and I’m a International trainer in several personal development techniques. I love to share my work in groups and private consultations.

How can you join the workshop?

Participation is 60 euro. IMPORTANT! It is necessary to contact me in advance because of the limited places. Please email me ( [masked] ) or call me on:[masked] 972.

With Love,

Darko
name: Breath therapy Introduction

description: This evening is for people which already did any form of Breathwork,Rebirthing or Holotropic breathing.
